name: A Light That Never Goes Out (TLG Studio)
name_original: A Light That Never Goes Out (TLG Studio)
description:
A Light That Never Goes Out is a synthwave arcade driving game, made for the Record Collection 2k23 game jam.

The song that the game is referencing is a synthwave remix made by Astrophysics of the song "There is A Light That Never Goes Out" by The Smiths (where instead of a car you are riding a bike).

CONTROLS:

A, D or Left and Right - Steering
